Title: Enacts the fair share for homeless shelters act
Summary: Establishes an office of fair share enforcement to oversee compliance with fair share mandates for siting of homeless shelters; provides for fair distribution of homeless shelters across municipalities and community districts to best serve the homeless population; requires reporting; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add Art 2-A Title 3 §§46 - 46-e, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to enacting the "fair share for homeless shelters act"
